sense.def: Alternative Names dan shi fa dong 丹石發動 , outbreak of cinnabar [et al.] mineral [poisoning]; dan shi fa 丹石發 , outbreak of cinnabar [et al.] mineral [poisoning]; dan shi yao fa 丹石藥 發 , outbreak of cinnabar [et al.] mineral drug [poisoning]; jin shi yao fa 金石藥發 , outbreak of mineral drug [poisoning]; jin shi yao fa dong 金石藥發動 , outbreak of mineral drug [poisoning]; jin shi fa dong 金石發動 , outbreak of mineral [drug poisoning]. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of poisoning resulting from an ingestion of medication based on differently toxic cinnabar [et al.] minerals. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 31: 仙人煉絳雪，療一 切病，肺氣積聚咳逆，嘔吐膿血，丹石毒發，天行時氣，一切熱病，諸 黃膽等 , “The immortals have a chemical process for preparing crimson color snow. It cures all diseases, including accumulations and collections of lung qi with cough and counterflow, vomiting pus and blood, outbreaks of cinnabar [et al.] mineral poisoning , heaven-sent seasonal qi, all types of heat disease, and all types of jaundice”.
